name: sap.watt.platform.tipsandtricks.service.TipsAndTricksProvider
description: The interface that each plugin configuration of the tips and tricks manager must implement

getView.description: Returns a view that will be the content of the tips and tricks dialog when the current tip is shown

isAvailable.description: Decides if the tip is to be shown or not

returns.description: true if the tip should be available in the tips and tricks dialog
